title: Concatenate Text and Say
description:
Using the starter blocks in the tray build a program that speaks character name and age in the following example format.

Name: Sasha
Age: 17

You will need to change the text in both of the provided blocks. Use the '+' to concatenate or type the full line of text.
hint:
Add each block in the tray to the editor. Then edit the name say block to include the character name. Next, edit the age say block to use concatenation(i.e. +), similar to the how it was done in the name block, to add another piece of text that speaks the character's age.

In this task you will need to remember, text must start and end with quotation marks and concatenation is used to add two or more groups of text together.
